title: 4-year-old girl shot by brother in Trigg County
content:
CADIZ, KY (WSMV) -
A 4-year-old girl is in the hospital after her brother allegedly shot her, and the man accused of bringing the gun into the house has been arrested.
According to the Trigg County Sheriff's Office, the 5-year-old boy was playing with a .22-caliber handgun that he found on a counter in the living room.
The girl was shot in the stomach while she was watching TV in her bedroom.
According to the Kentucky New Era, the girl was flown to a hospital in Evansville, IN. She said to be recovering.
Brandon Nicholas Fowle, 19, is in custody, facing a wanton endangerment charge. The sheriff's office said he is not related to either child but had been staying at the home.
Fowler allegedly brought the gun into the house and left it unattended within the child's reach.
The mother of both children was at home at the time of the incident. She has not been charged.
